titleStmt.title: The Second Part of King Henry the Fourth
titleStmt.author: William Shakespeare

respStmt.name: Craig A. Berry, Martin Mueller, and Clifford Wulfman
Lawrence Berland, Hilary Bina, Katherine Gould, Kreg Segal, Nicholas Terrell

publicationStmt.p: The WordHoard Shakespeare is a joint project of the Perseus Project at Tufts University, The Northwestern University Library, and Northwestern University Academic Technologies. It is derived from The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare , edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright (1891-3). The Internet Shakespeare editions of the quartos and folios have been consulted to create a modern text that observes as closely as possible the morphological and prosodic practices of the earliest editions. Spellings, especially of contracted and hyphenated forms, have been standardized across the corpus. The text has been fully lemmatized and morphosyntactically tagged.

Â© 2003. The copyright to The WordHoard Shakespeare is owned jointly by Northwestern University and Tufts University. The WordHoard Shakespeare is provided for free solely for non-commercial use by students, scholars, and the public. Any commercial use or publication of it, in whole or in part, without prior written authorization of the copyright holders is strictly prohibited.

sourceDesc.p: The Wordhoard Shakespeare is derived from, but not identical with, The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare (1891-3) edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright.

castItem.roleDesc: Prince of Wales, afterwards King Henry V

castItem.role: Lord Chief-Justice of the King's Bench

castItem.roleDesc: hostess of a tavern in Eastcheap
Lords and Attendants; Porter, Beadles, Grooms etc.

div.head: Act 1, Induction
div.stage: Enter Rumour, painted full of tongues.

div.head: Act 1, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter FALSTAFF, with his Page bearing his sword and buckler.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Enter the Lord Chief-Justice and Servant.

div.head: Act 1, Scene 3
div.stage: Enter the ARCHBISHOP, the LORDS HASTINGS, MOWBRAY, and BARDOLPH.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter Hostess, FANG and his Boy With her, and SNARE following.

sp.speaker: Page
sp.stage: Enter the LORD CHIEF-JUSTICE, and his men.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Exeunt Hostess, Bardolph, Officers, and Boy.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 3
div.stage: Enter NORTHUMBERLAND, LADY NORTHUMBERLAND, and LADY PERCY.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 4
div.stage: London. The Boar's-head Tavern in Eastcheap.

sp.speaker: Doll Tearsheet
sp.stage: Enter, behind, PRINCE HENRY and POINS, disguised

sp.speaker: Prince
sp.stage: Exeunt Prince Henry, Poins, Peto and Bardolph,

div.head: Act 3, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter the KING in his nightgown, with a Page.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter SHALLOW and SILENCE, meeting; MOULDY, SHADOW, WART, FEEBLE, BULLCALF, a Servant or two with them.

sp.speaker: Silence
sp.stage: Enter BARDOLPH and one with him.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter the ARCHBISHOP OF YORK, MOWBRAY, HASTINGS, and others.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter, from one side, MOWBRAY, attended; afterwards the ARCHBISHOP, HASTINGS, and others: from the other side, PRINCE JOHN OF LANCASTER, and WESTMORELAND; Officers, and others with them.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Enter PRINCE JOHN OF LANCASTER, WESTMORELAND, BLUNT, and others.

l.stage: Exeunt Blunt and others with Colevile.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 4
div.stage: Enter the KING, the PRINCES THOMAS OF CLARENCE and HUMPHREY OF GLOUCESTER, WARWICK, and others.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 5
div.stage: The KING lying on a bed; CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER, WARwICK, and others in attendance.

l.stage: Re-enter WARWICK, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE,and the rest.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter SHALLOW, FALSTAFF, BARDOLPH, and Page.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter WARWICK and the Lord Chief-Justice, meeting.

l.stage: Enter LANCASTER, CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER, WESTMORELAND, and others.
Enter KING HENRY the Fifth, attended.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 3
div.stage: Enter FALSTAFF, SHALLOW, SILENCE, DAVY, BARDOLPH, and the Page.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: To Silence, seeing him take off a bumper.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 4
div.stage: Enter Beadles, dragging in HOSTESS QUICKLY and DOLL TEARSHEET.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 5
div.stage: A public place near Westminster Abbey.

sp.speaker: Third Groom
sp.stage: Enter FALSTAFF, SHALLOW, PISTOL, BARDOLPH, and Page.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Shouts within, and the trumpets sound.

l.stage: Enter the KING and his train, the LORD CHIEF-JUSTICE among them.

sp.speaker: Falstaff
sp.stage: Re-enter PRINCE JOHN, the LORD CHIEF-JUSTICE; Officers with them.

sp.speaker: Pistol
sp.stage: Exeunt all but Prince John and the Chief-Justice.
